item.title: 【Music Videos】PACK - ★NSYNC - Thinking of You (JC Version) [4K Upscaled]
item.description:
Hi thanks for letting me joined this incredible site. I can pretty much find hd music video that i wanted.
Here, I wanna share this underrated hidden gem MV that need to be preserved online. SME Just blocked any version of this MV especially JC version to that surfaced on YouTube.
I'm enraged because this JC version is the best. Great singing of JC, great instrumental. Great acting.
But the hd version of it were nowhere to found. There's only one left in YouTube that is reupload and very blurry and even have 60 fps ai hack that u really hate when I found out it's degrading the quality and doesn't aligned with the director's intended.

Finally I found the original source of that video in full HD , I got it somewhere somehow.
I had to cropped the top part because it has watermark. But it's still better compared to the one in YouTube. It's in original 24 fps. I have changed the colors and made some enhancements including better audio and ai upscaled to 4K format using this incredible site called: Tensorpix.ai. (go check it out it's worth it!)

I managed to made the best version of this MV since the official account refuse to upload it. (They still hiding JC's talent, shame on them)
Ok Enjoy.


https://mega.nz/file/Ci5WjSbY#6QEyzYoFGGWUveJv0nb7kut5UPj5mHCA0LhFISOhfJ8
item.author: David Ariyan
